rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with Vastu-compliant positioning for positive energy. Designed to align the main door facing east.
Large living area adjoining the garden view. Open space design for social gatherings; windows on eastern wall for natural light.
Functional kitchen with south-facing windows to allow morning sunlight. Adjacent to dining area and connected by a sliding door.
Spacious dining space near the kitchen for convenience; integrates natural light from adjacent window openings.
Ground floor bathroom with north orientation to balance energy flow.
A compact room for staff, ensuring privacy and convenience; includes a small kitchenette. Adheres to Vastu principles by avoiding negative energy zones.
Utilitarian space for household storage, located in the west to maintain balance per Vastu guidelines.

openings.description: Main entrance door facing east in accordance with Vastu principles to welcome positive energy.
Multiple windows along eastern wall for ample morning sunlight and ventilation.
Secondary entrance leading directly to servant quarters, ensuring discreet access.

levels.notes: The ground floor design of the farmhouse integrates functional spaces with local building norms, including a large garden adjacent to the living area. The layout respects Vastu principles by orienting key features such as the main door and windows towards the east while maintaining balance on all sides.
